divs: sighting detailsi was in my home, went out to get my dogs. the yard is fenced and i left the porch to call them. i looked to the south and over head of the homes was an orb. it was flying very slow. i could out run it if i had wanted to. the orb was red\orange, made no noise and was approximately one to two feet above the very tops of the homes. all were single family residences and all homes were single story. i ran got my camera and started filming the orb. by the time i got the lens cap off and turned on the video the orb had started to assend. i was with three other people, they saw it too. i ask my neighbor if he had seen anything the night before. he said, "o was it the orb?". his wife that was with him didn't know what he was talking about. i said, "have you seen it before?". he said no< "but it has been around here for years." "what are you talking about?", his wife asked. but he got quiet and walked away. this was a very large orb, about the volumn of 3 cars easy, not a small one at all. jennifer smith
trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Prescott Valley
There were no other sightings in Prescott Valley on or around March 24th 2006
Summary: Sighted an orb moving over houses.
